abstract: Ken Johnson reviews sound-and-light installation Dream House by La Monte Young, Marian Zazeela and Jung Hee Choi at Dia:Chelsea.
lead_paragraph: A restaging of the famous 1960s sound-and-light installation by La Monte Young and Marian Zazeela, in collaboration with Jung Hee Choi.

headline.main: Review: ‘Dream House’ at Dia:Chelsea, a Hallucinatory Show
headline.print_headline: Review: ‘Dream House’ at Dia:Chelsea, a Hallucinatory Show

snippet: A restaging of the famous 1960s sound-and-light installation by La Monte Young and Marian Zazeela, in collaboration with Jung Hee Choi.
